website_summaries.verdict: A durable and well-made boat light that offers good water penetration.
pros: Available in several colors, including blue and green
Very bright, with good water penetration
Good-quality construction from marine-grade anodized aluminum
Does not need an external controller
cons: Some reports that this product  arrived defective or only lasted a short period of time

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2...Installed as directed..tested and seemed ok until the light hit the water. Flickers on & off, on and off. Not happy at all with this very expensive purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these lights on a 29' Blackfin and couldn't be happier with the results
customer_reviews.text: I installed 2 of these lights on a 29' Blackfin and couldn't be happier with the results. Lights up the wake 35' behind the boat on plane. I wish I ordered just the blue lights or just the white lights to get more output, but the variety is nice for aesthetics vs fishing!
customer_reviews.author: Dad Marsden

customer_reviews.title: They were fairly easy to install and instructions and templates made it easy
customer_reviews.text: These really put out the light for night fishing. They were fairly easy to install and instructions and templates made it easy. Also, there are several videos on youtube showing how to install.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: Lunitec Seablaze 3
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these lights on my 32 foot boat and they look amazing. When purchasing these lights make sure you only get one color if not it divides the lums into two and will not be as bright
customer_reviews.author: cafe

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, customer was happy with installment. Cheaper then my electronic distribution company I use by the name of seawide marine. Saved over 80 bucks per light.
customer_reviews.author: matt r.

customer_reviews.title: SeaBlaze3
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the SeaBlaze3 dual color white/blue. Looks nice on my 21foot e7 Bayliner. Two installed, easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: May upgrade next year
customer_reviews.text: Have brought three of these lights before. They look great on my boat
customer_reviews.author: Vance Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I have them on my 2017 yamha 195 jet boat.There great! idling bright,when you start cruizing fantastic! Love em! And I have to say coming out of the boat harbor my little 19ft got a. alot of attention! I recommend them! So cool!
customer_reviews.author: John Ricatone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: Put two of these on my center console recently and used them on a two night tournament. They were very bright at night and illuminated the water in an even pattern about 50 ft back . Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Hirshberg

customer_reviews.title: Works for 1 month and quits
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, for a month..... $1000 to pull my boat to replace.... don’t waste your money on these
customer_reviews.author: Brian corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Retox
customer_reviews.text: These are great underwater lights. The blue is spectacular both at the dock and while running. I put 4 on the back of my 39 Midnight "Retox" and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Lights at a great price - Very easy to install and excellent performance
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Underwater lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights. Bright and love being able to change the colors. Each color is so different. At the moment we have our boat in the Charles River and they look great but can not wait to see them in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Huminik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lights - Have had them for 3+ years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Lights - Have had them for 3+ years and they still look just as good as when I first bought them. amazing light output for an amazing "underwater" led price.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my 2010 Yamaha SX230, they work well. Wish they were a little brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Abram Hale

customer_reviews.title: better quality and price compared to OCEAN LED
customer_reviews.text: Consistent blue color, better quality and price compared to OCEAN LED.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S Widjaja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good light instructions was easy would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Two lights illuminated water 20 feet behind ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Two lights illuminated water 20 feet behind the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, worthwhile! The light is clear and when installed is beautiful. It really makes the difference in the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Guila

customer_reviews.title: Best Underwater LED for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: These lights are every bit as good or better as Ocean LED for half the money. Also the installation was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Richy Brensinger

customer_reviews.title: Night dive ready!
customer_reviews.text: These are really bright! Installed and tested during the daylight and they were blinding, can't wait to get out on the water at night now.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 units and had someone install them. One ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 units and had someone install them. One of the units doesn't perform correctly. I called Lumitec and they said that it must be the installation. Took the boat back to the installer who checked the voltage to the units and reported that the voltage was the same to all lights. Lumitec says that it won't pay for R&R labor on the light ( $200) each. If I remove the defective (?) light and send it back to LUmitec, I can't use the boat. I'm stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne H.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install if you know how to use a ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't beat the price, fast shipping, easy to install if you know how to use a drill and connect electrical wires properly. Great light output at any color selection. I need to get 12 more and do the whole boat so it looks like Close Encounters of the Third Kind sail the boat across the bay!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zorin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it but the newer version is nicer and better.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: ... lot of research before ordering these lights and am happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before ordering these lights and am happy I did. Easy to install and wire on my 2015 Regal 1900ES. They turned out to be much brighter than expected and are especially noticeable in the murky river water once the boat is up on plane; lights up the whole wake.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

product_meta.title: Lumitec SeaBlaze3 LED Underwater Boat Light, Surface Mount, Non-Dimmable
product_meta.description:
Surface mount for fast easy installation. Completely self contained with no external driver boxes to mount.

 * Lumens (White): 1729
 * Voltage: 10-30v DC
 * 12v DC Amps: 2.4A
 * 24v DC Amps: 1.1A
 * Rated Watts:32
 * CCT:6500CRI:70+
 * Op. Temp F/C:-31/35 to + 131/55
 * Timed Toggled Protocol (TTP):Yes
 * Third Party Dimmer Compatibility (3PD) :No
 * Color Match Commitment (CM):No
 * Mounting Hole Diameter:1/2"
 * Length: N/A
 * Width: N/A
 * Depth: 0.79in (2.00cm)
 * Diameter: 3.91in (9.93cm)
feature_bullets: 1729 lumens, 12 volt DC to 24 volt DC, 10 - 30v DC
Transom mountable with only a small 1/2 inch through-hull hole
Made in the USA - all Lumitec lights are designed, tested and assembled in the U.S., Lumitec supports American business and creates American jobs
2.4 Amps at 12v DC, 1.1 Amps at 24v DC
